CustomField.formula: CASE( Status, "New", IMAGE("/resource/1648645213000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/flag_yellow.png", "NEW"), "IN PROGRESS", IMAGE("/resource/1648645213000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/flag_green.png", "IN PROGRESS"), "Pending Merchant Reply", IMAGE("/resource/1648645213000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/flag_blue.png", "Pending Merchant Reply"), "Pending Carrier Reply", IMAGE("/resource/1648645213000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/flag_purple.png", "Pending Carrier Reply"), "On Hold", IMAGE("/resource/1648645213000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/flag_orange.png", "On Hold"), IMAGE("/resource/1648645213000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/flag_red.png", "Closed") )
CustomField.label: Status Image
